oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Foy Willing And The Riders Of The Purple Sage - Dickies show - 1949-02-12
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage radio program sponsored by Dickies, styled as 'Dickies Riders Of The Purple Sage'. Featuring Foy Willing, Al Sloey, Johnny Paul, Bud Sievert, Scotty Harrel, and Jerry Vaughn. Recorded by KRLD, Dallas, TX.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Dickies commercial (Foy Willing) -- Theme -- Opening statement (Foy Willing) -- Cowboys And Indians -- Foy Willing talks -- Lay Your Little Head On My Shoulder -- Dickies commercial (Foy Willing) -- Too Late -- Foy Willing and Johnny Paul talk -- After You've Gone (Johnny Paul fiddle) -- Dickies commercial (Foy Willing) -- Foy Willing talks -- Nobody's Lost On The Lonesome Trail -- Theme -- Closing statement (Foy Willing)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KRLD (Radio station : Dallas, Tex.); Williamson-Dickie Manufacturing Company; Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Sloey, Al; Paul, Johnny (Violinist); Harrell, Scotty; Sievert, Bud; Vaughn, Jerry
